fields.name: Cimac Adult Karate Uniform
fields.description:
The Cimac Karate Suit in White comes with a classic Karate jacket, trousers and white belt. 

- Adult karate suit
- Elasticated waistband
- White belt included
- 60% Cotton, 40% Polyester
- Cold wash, drip dry

fields.name: Blitz Adult Shinzou Martial Arts Gi - 8.5oz
fields.description:
- Lighter alternative for training and competition
- Maximum comfort and unrestricted movement
- Trousers have an elastic/tie waistband
- 65% polyester/35% cotton

The Blitz Shinzou Martial Arts Suit provides a lighter alternative during intense training sessions and competition, offering maximum comfort and unrestricted movement. The European cut provides full-length sleeves and trouser legs, with reinforced seams to increase durability. The trousers have an elastic/tie waistband, allowing for perfect fit and comfort. The plain, minimalistic design allows the suit to be personalised with club logos and associations, with a woven Shinzou label featuring on the lapel and top of the left leg. Belt not included. 65% polyester/35% cotton. 8.5oz

fields.name: Blitz Kids Cotton Student Karate Gi - 7oz
fields.description:
- Ideal first gi for students
- Trousers have an elastic/tie waistband
- White belt included
- 100% cotton
- 7oz

Ideal first gi for students. Traditional wrap over Karate suit. Soft to touch and non-abrasive to the skin, made with a flawless loom weave to give a great smooth finish. The jacket is longer than most to stop riding up over the belt. Trousers have an elastic/tie waist for a precise and comfortable fit. Plain, minimalistic design allows suit to be personalised with club logos and associations. Woven Blitz label on lapel and on the top of left leg. White belt included. 100% cotton. 7oz

fields.name: Blitz Kids Odachi WKF Approved Karate Gi - 14oz
fields.description:
- Approved by the World Karate Federation (WKF)
- Japanese cut: ¾ length sleeves and trouser legs
- Three-sectional trouser gusset to prevent hitching
- 100% brushed cotton canvas
- 14oz

Tested and approved by the Official World Karate Federation (WKF). Suitable for National and International competition, as well as club use. Designed for advanced Karate practitioners, our heavyweight Odachi Karate Suit is Japanese cut to prevent the long jacket from riding up and providing ¾ length sleeves and trouser legs.

Suit features a super-soft shoulder sublimated lining to provide that extra bit of comfort during the most intense training sessions and, a three-sectional trouser gusset to prevent hitching and maximise movement. Trousers have a traditional tie waist.

Plain, minimalistic design allows suit to be personalised with club logos and associations. Woven Odachi/WKF label on lapel and on the top of left leg. An embroidered Blitz logo features on the right chest and the back of the neck as required by the WKF.

Comes with a drawstring bag to store the suit. Belt not included. 100% brushed cotton canvas. 14oz.

fields.name: Blitz Adult Odachi WKF Approved Karate Gi - 14oz
fields.description:
- Approved by the World Karate Federation (WKF)
- Japanese cut: ¾ length sleeves and trouser legs
- Three-sectional trouser gusset to prevent hitching
- 100% brushed cotton canvas
- 14oz

Tested and approved by the Official World Karate Federation (WKF). Suitable for National and International competition, as well as club use. fields.name: Karate My Life
fields.description:
by Hirokazu Kanazawa (Author)

ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01LP4JEKQ
Publisher ‏ : ‎ Kendo World Publications Ltd. (January 1, 1755)
Best Sellers Rank: #16,074,408 in Books

fields.name: A Karate Story
fields.description:
Paperback English
By (author)  Seamus O'Dowd , Foreword by  Hirokazu Kanazawa

Libraries & Academic Institutions edition of the autobiography of well-known Irish karate instructor, Seamus O'Dowd. The book chronicles his journey, over a period of thirty years, from complete novice to high-ranking and respected international instructor for Bo-Jutsu and Tai Chi. Simple, humorous and heart-warming, the book will inspire and entertain martial artists of all levels.

Format Paperback | 180 pages
Dimensions 156 x 234 x 10mm | 259g
Publication date 14 Dec 2016
Publisher Createspace Independent Publishing Platform
Language English
Illustrations note Illustrations, black and white
ISBN10 154108599X
ISBN13 9781541085992

fields.name: Karate: The Complete Kata
fields.description:
Hardback English
By (author)  Hirokazu Kanazawa , Translated by  Richard Berger

The martial art of karate can be practiced by anyone, regardless of age or gender, and can be undertaken at any time during a person's life. Embraced by people the world over, this traditional Japanese art continues to hold universal appeal. Among the most important aspects of karate practice are the kata, patterns of movement that are carefully choreographed and arranged in sequences.
With Karate: The Complete Kata, Hirokazu Kanazawa, the foremost figure in the karate world today and a disciple of Gichin Funakoshi, the father of modern karate.

Format Hardback | 239 pages
Dimensions 200 x 267 x 22.86mm | 832g
Publication date 03 Jul 2013
Publisher Kodansha America, Inc
Publication City/Country London, United States
Language English
Illustrations note 1 Illustrations, unspecified
ISBN10 1568365179
ISBN13 9781568365176
Bestsellers rank 58,241

fields.name: Karate for Kids
fields.description:
Hardback Martial Arts for Kids English
By (author)  Robin L. Rielly , By (author)  Stephanie Tok

A fun and accessible introduction to studying karate-designed specifically with the interests and capabilities of young martial artists in mind.

First-time martial arts students are not just starting a program of physical and mental practice. They are entering a new world-one that not only has new rules, new goals, and even new clothing-but that also offers them lots of new opportunities for fun and accomplishment.

Karate for Kids will help prepare kids to start learning about karate and help them practice at home. It includes thorough introductions to the history and philosophy of the techniques, what to expect in the first few classes, how to warm up and practice, and advice on setting goals.

For ages 9-12
Format Hardback | 48 pages
Dimensions 216 x 279 x 12.7mm | 510g
Publication date 31 Jul 2004
Publisher Tuttle Publishing
Publication City/Country Boston, United States
Language English
Illustrations note full-color illus throughout
ISBN10 0804835349
ISBN13 9780804835343
Bestsellers rank 325,712

fields.name: Karate Gloves, Thumbless - WKF, Wacoku
fields.description:
Wacoku thumbless karate gloves are WKF approved.

They are made of durable vinyl with adjustable velcro closure.

They are designed for karate fighting and intense training.

fields.name: Inflatable Boxing Punching Bag
fields.description:
High Quality Material: Made of high quality PVC material, lightweight and leak-proof, thick and durable, and good flexibility and fast rebound, conducive to martial arts training.

How to Install-.First open the bottom white cover and fill it with water! (Sand, rice, cassia seeds are also acceptable), the more water, the more stable the station.

Double Cover Design-The sealed double-cap design effectively prevents the added water from leaking out! Thickened ground to stabilize the weight and prevent rollover during kicking.

fields.name: Makura Ignis Pro Gum Shield - Youth - White/Pink
fields.description:
Makura Ignis Pro Mouthguards have been designed to the highest level of protection and comfort. They are all fully CE compliant so you can be sure you are buying and wearing something that will provide the perfect level of safety in those all important matches and training sessions.

Features
Boil & Bite mouthguard for custom fit.
Super- tough shokbloker outer.
Ultimate comfort Gelform liner.
'Airthru' channel improves breathing.
'Slipsafe' pads prevent slipping.

fields.name: Platinum Membership
fields.description: Platinum membership gives you unlimited class access every month. Free access to Dojo and facilities for practice.

fields.name: Gold Membership
fields.description: With the Gold membership, you have a limited of 3 classes per week. And 3 times of using dojo and facilities every week.

fields.name: Silver Membership
fields.description: With the Silver membership, you have a limited 2 classes per week, 2 times of access to the dojo and facilities for practice.

fields.name: Bronze Membership
fields.description: With a Bronze membership, you have a limited to 1 class every week. 1 practice access to the dojo and facilities.
